website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ MX522 business projector is light enough to carry easily, at 5.1 pounds and offers a bright, high-quality data image at a native XGA (1024 by 768) resolution, plus watchable video and 3D.
pros: Lamp rated at up to 10,000 hours

customer_reviews.title: benq is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: nice projector. good price. long bulb life. and SUPER customer service with BenQ. anytime i have needed one cleaned i have sent it in and paid shipping and they have cleaned it up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah J.

customer_reviews.title: Decent projector
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a projector and this is a good one for it's price. I was hoping for a short-throw projector, but this is not. I wanted to project an image about 30" by 40" from about 4 feet away, but this needs closer to 7' for that size. The image however is clear and crisp and very bright even in a lightly lite room. EDIT: after about 3 years of sporadic use (less than 1200 hours), the power supply went belly flop.
customer_reviews.author: From New Hampsha

customer_reviews.title: Bright and clear
customer_reviews.text: Very clear, very bright picture. Compared with other projectors in our office, it doesn't have as wide an angle on the picture, so you have to mount it farther back to get the same size. I realize that comment is totally relative to my point of reference, but there it is. We are very happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.text: For the price and weight and convenience I do like it . If the resolution was 1200 x 1600 it would have been perfect but I was aware that XGA projectors do not have that high native resolution. I am a college student on a budget and do recommended the product. However, it you have extra 200 bucks do go for a higher resolution product so that you can truly appreciate HD content.

customer_reviews.title: The firmware needs a LOT of work!!!
customer_reviews.text: The firmware need a LOT of work!!! Don't expect any of the features to work the same as any other projector. Other reviewer call it buggy, I call it unusable. Every time I turn on the projectors they display a message that the lamps are past there lifecycle, but they have less than 5 hours on them. If you don't press ENTER when the lamp life message is displayed the projectors lockup requiring a power cycle to reset.

customer_reviews.title: The integrated speaker is not too great but we didn't expect it to be
customer_reviews.text: We use it for watching movies at home and gives a crisp and very bright image, even during the day. The integrated speaker is not too great but we didn't expect it to be, we always use it with external speakers.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable HDMI 3D READY 3000L ECO Projector
customer_reviews.text: This is the best projector I have owned yet, I have owned 3 and this Ben Q MX522 IS just what I was looking for with it's 10,000 hour lamp life,3D Ready, amazing 3000L and HDMI You cant go wrong for it's price!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector recently and when I received it found that it will not work with my new MacBook computer because it does not have an HDMI output! HDMI has been around for a while and is no longer "cutting edge" technology. I was not aware that BenQ offers the same model with an HDMI output for an additional $5.00. Seriously...five bucks and you have to create an entirely different model? Better yet just included HDMI on all your products so that people won't have to have this problem in the future. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: BenQ MX522 XGA 3000L HDMI Smarteco 3D Projector with 10,000 Hour Lamp Life Projector
product_meta.description:
The perfect choice to deliver stunning images and lower total cost of ownership.View larger SmartEco lamp saving technology offers great energy savings and delivers amazing quality.View larger THE BEST VALUE CHOICE FOR A SMALL-MEDIUM SPACE
Featuring a XGA resolution, a brightness of 3000 ANSI lumens, a contrast ratio of 13,000:1, and an unbelievable lamp life of up to 10,000 hours, the MX522 is the perfect projector choice for your everyday life. Whether it's in business, education, or at home, the MX522 delivers stunning images and lower total cost of ownership.

SMARTECO LAMP SAVING TECHNOLOGY
Incorporating BenQ's renowned SmartEco Lamp Saving Technology, the MX522 not only offers greater energy savings to you, but continues to deliver amazing picture quality through this innovative technology. The SmartEco mode is designed to use only the exact amount of lamp power a projector needs to deliver the best contrast performance. With this feature, schools get to provide students and teachers uncompromised projection quality and reduce the total cost of ownership by extending the lamp life and lowering power consumption. Within the SmartEco Lamp Saving Technology umbrella, Lamp Care mode takes your dollars further by offering an astonishing lamp life of up to 10,000 hours.

3D BLU-RAY READY PROJECTION
MX522 is equipped with 3D Blu-Ray ready projection technology to bring you the same amazing 3D effects you get in 3D movies. Offered for no added cost, the 3D feature on 3D Blu-Ray ready BenQ projectors gives your audience an immersive real-life experience. Get ready to experience 3D like you've never seen it before.

TECHNOLOGY FOR LONGER BULB LIFE
There will be times when a projector is turned on without a display source, such as a classroom PC or notebook. To avoid a projector from running with full lamp power, BenQ created the No Source Detected feature to lower the projector lamp brightness to 30% after the projector has remained unconnected to a display source for more than three minutes. When inactive, the MX522 keeps power consumption to a minimum of 0.5W standby power further lowering your total cost of ownership.

SPECIFICATIONS
 * Projection System: DLP 
 * Native Resolution: XGA (1024 x 768) 
 * Brightness: 3000AL 
 * Contrast Ratio: 13,000:1 
 * Display Color: 1.07 Billion Colors 
 * Lens: F=2.5-2.7, f=22.08-24.28mm 
 * Aspect Ratio: Native 4:3 (5 aspect ratio selectable) 
 * Throw Ratio: 1.97-2.17 (50"@2m) 
 * Image Size (Diagonal): 34"-300" 
 * Zoom Ratio: 1.1:1 
 * Lamp Type: 190W 
 * Keystone Adjustment: 1D, Vertical ± 40 degrees 
 * Projection Offset: 130% ±5% 
 * Resolution Support: VGA (640 x 480) to UXGA(1600 x 1200) 
 * Horizontal Frequency: 15-102KHz 
 * Vertical Scan Rate: 23-120Hz

VERSATILE INPUT AND OUTPUT TERMINALS
The MX522 comes loaded with a versatile array of inputs and outputs to connect your devices. The MX522 includes HDMI connection, mini-jack Audio In and Out, S-Video, RCA Video Out, D-sub 15-pin inputs and monitor out, RS232 for control systems, and Mini-B USB.
